Name: Spanakopita easy
Description: Use puff pastry and frozen spinach
Steps: saute onion and green onion in pan for 5 minutes
mixed with thawed out spinach,feta, nutmeg
Mix feta and egg, add to spinach once cold
Notes: 2020-04-25 didn't have frozen, regular spinach was too large. Need to roll out puff pastry and divide into more triangles. Goal should be 18
